nodes.text: The Ministry of Science or Minisci was a branch of the Galactic Republic government based in the Minisci Arcology on Coruscant.
In 22 BBY, the Ministry of Science and Dr. Sionver Boll were working on the antidote to the virus released by Zeta Magnus on the population of the planet Marat V.

In the same year, it was engaged in hypermatter research, and had received a grant from Republic Sienar Systems to continue its studies (presumably RSS was motivated by the need to develop it for the Expeditionary Battle Planetoid). At this time, Paldis Doxin of the Magrody Institute of Programmable Intelligence was involved in the research.
Umak Leth, a representative of the Ministry, participated in a debate on the HoloNet regarding the mystery weapon that had destroyed a dozen Republic naval task forces.
